ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Venril
ygData.msgSnippet: What?  You mean hundreds of bards aren t lining up for a chance to kill Venril so they can all summon food if they get lucky and get their legs dropped???
ygData.messageBody:
What? You mean hundreds of bards aren't lining up for a chance to kill
Venril so they can all summon food if they get lucky and get their legs
dropped???

Shamelessly sarcastic

Kit

i know, i said that you can proc even if you miss and do no damage. but i
think that is because it is coded as a HIT but for 0 damage. with a rune
effect up, there are no hits, so the Venril proc did not work on us. he
only hit for 8 or so dmg then, so the rune never wore off. now he hits for
300 i think. i'm not sure if a 200 poison resist will do much against him,
and not sure if anyone wants to try now =)

Shada
